extendedInfo.description: Games of Ludo and Dada with multiple behavior choices for droid players.Game configuration:- Ludo/Dada- Get out on a 1, a 6, a 1 or a 6- Allow to pass squares already occupied by two other piecesDroid player configuration:- Behavior: Strategist, Hare, Tortoise, Random- Nuance: Mean, Nice, Careful, Compassionate, RandomOptions during game:- Turn sound on/off- Fast game (faster dice rolls and piece moves, do not stop to ask for input when there is only one choice available)Languages:- English- FrenchNo ads.
